name: solar sandbox S
description:
Use Arrow keys to move the camera

Press W and S to zoom

Click on an object to edit it

Click off of the editor to close it

Click the tab in the bottom to spawn objects

Move your mouse to the top left of the screen to show the control panel

Press "O" in the catalog to toggle orbit mode

Press "P" to pause the game

Press "Z" to create a new solar system
